Sentencas: The performance of nickel-based anode materials for solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs) could be deteriorated by redox treatments accompanied with the microstructural change.
Titulo: Microstructural Evolution of Ni-YSZ Cermet Anode under Thermal Cycles with Redox Treatments

Sentencas: In this study, Ni-yttria-stabilized zirconia (Ni-YSZ) anode was subjected to thermal cycles with redox treatments (thermal-redox cycles: repetition of oxidation in cooling and reduction in heating processes).
Titulo: Microstructural Evolution of Ni-YSZ Cermet Anode under Thermal Cycles with Redox Treatments

Sentencas: The microstructural change of anodes was quantified by focused ion beam-scanning electron microscopy.
Titulo: Microstructural Evolution of Ni-YSZ Cermet Anode under Thermal Cycles with Redox Treatments

Sentencas: The decrement in the active triple phase boundary (TPB) length caused by sintering and agglomeration of Ni particles was correlated with the performance deterioration.
Titulo: Microstructural Evolution of Ni-YSZ Cermet Anode under Thermal Cycles with Redox Treatments

Sentencas: Furthermore, it was found that the onset temperature of reduction treatment in the heating process was one of the critical factors for the microstructural evolution of anode; the agglomeration of Ni particles was promoted significantly under the reduction started from 500 degrees C, while no notable change was confirmed for the case of 900 degrees C. (C) The Author(s) 2015.
Titulo: Microstructural Evolution of Ni-YSZ Cermet Anode under Thermal Cycles with Redox Treatments
